long_description: REI Nubby Arm Warmers are perfect when you want to keep the chill off your arms but don't need the warmth of a jacket. Soft acrylic knit offers excellent warmth; it also breathes well when you're active and dries quickly when damp. Arm warmers are 8.5 in. long; can be layered under long sleeves or tucked under short sleeves to extend coverage. Thumb loops keep the REI Nubby arm warmers covering the backs of your hands.
short_description: REI Nubby Arm Warmers are perfect when you want to keep the chill off your arms but don't need the warmth of a jacket.
